channel.title: CVE Feed for Axis Communications AB -- AXIS A1001 Network Door Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Axis Communications AB -- AXIS A1001 Network Door Controller

item.title: CVE-2023-21405|2024-10-15T19:09:35.946Z -- axis%20communications%20ab -- axis%20a1001%20network%20door%20controller
item.description: Knud from Fraktal.fi has found a flaw in some Axis Network Door Controllers and Axis Network Intercoms when communicating over OSDP, highlighting that the OSDP message parser crashes the pacsiod process, causing a temporary unavailability of the door-controlling functionalities meaning that doors cannot be opened or closed. No sensitive or customer data can be extracted as the Axis device is not further compromised. Please refer to the Axis security advisory for more information, mitigation and affected products and software versions.
